mapper.select: select detail_warehouse_key, input_output_key, type, trans_type,quantity, at_time, start_num, final_num, shopkeeper_warehouse_key from detail_warehouse where detail_warehouse_key = #{detailWarehouseKey}
mapper.insert: insert into detail_warehouse(detail_warehouse_key,input_output_key, type, trans_type,quantity, at_time, start_num, final_num, shopkeeper_warehouse_key) values (#{detailWarehouseKey},#{inputOutputKey}, #{type}, #{transType},#{quantity}, #{atTime}, #{startNum}, #{finalNum}, #{shopkeeperWarehouseKey})

insert into detail_warehouse(input_output_key, type, trans_type,quantity, at_time, start_num, final_num, shopkeeper_warehouse_key) values
(#{entity.inputOutputKey}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.transType},#{entity.quantity}, #{entity.atTime}, #{entity.startNum}, #{entity.finalNum}, #{entity.shopkeeperWarehouseKey})

insert into detail_warehouse(input_output_key, type, trans_type,quantity, at_time, start_num, final_num, shopkeeper_warehouse_key) values
(#{entity.inputOutputKey}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.transType},#{entity.quantity}, #{entity.atTime}, #{entity.startNum}, #{entity.finalNum}, #{entity.shopkeeperWarehouseKey})
on duplicate key update input_output_key = values(input_output_key), type = values(type), trans_type = values(trans_type), quantity = values(quantity), at_time = values(at_time), start_num = values(start_num), final_num = values(final_num), shopkeeper_warehouse_key = values(shopkeeper_warehouse_key)
mapper.update:
update detail_warehouse
input_output_key = #{inputOutputKey},
type = #{type},
trans_type = #{transType},
quantity = #{quantity},
at_time = #{atTime},
start_num = #{startNum},
final_num = #{finalNum},
shopkeeper_warehouse_key = #{shopkeeperWarehouseKey},
where detail_warehouse_key = #{detailWarehouseKey}
